programme.title: Playing Lessons
programme.desc: Tony Finau joins instructor Sean Foley on the course for an "inside the ropes" look at one of golf's longest hitters. Finau shares his insight on how he manages his way around the course from tee to green.

programme.title: Playing Lessons
programme.desc: The 2-time World Long Drive champion, Tim Burke, joins Sean Foley for a look at one of golf's longest drivers. Burke, a former college baseball player, turned his unique ability to drive the golf ball a long way into a world-class career.

programme.title: Swing Expedition With Chris Como
programme.desc: Chris Como visits a golf school at the Tour Striker Golf Academy in Phoenix. Learn how GOLFPASS coach Martin Chuck implements easy-to-use training aids to help fix swing faults for thousands of students a year.

programme.title: Swing Expedition With Chris Como
programme.desc: Chris Como and Andrew Getson share a common bond of coaching superstar golfers. Getson reveals what he's learned from his student, Phil Mickelson, as Como compares it to his time with Tiger Woods.

programme.title: Swing Expedition With Chris Como
programme.desc: Chris Como visits putting and short game expert Stan Utley in Scottsdale, Arizona. Learn how the putter arch should swing and how to minimize putter face rotation. Plus, Utley demonstrates the best tips for pitch and chip shots.

programme.title: Swing Expedition With Chris Como
programme.desc: Chris Como spends a day with rising-star coach Lucas Wald and two of his high profile students, Brandel Chamblee, and Eddie Fernandes. Lucas and Brandel demonstrate the adjustments made to Brandel's swing and how modern golf played its part.

programme.title: Swing Expedition With Chris Como
programme.desc: Chris Como spends a day with teaching legend Jim McLean for an in-depth look at his popular swing thoughts and his books. McLean also shares memories from his time with Arnold Palmer, Tiger Woods, and Carl Welty.

programme.title: Build a Better Game: Swing Checkpoints

programme.title: Breaking Your Slice With Nathalie Sheehan
programme.desc: Nathalie introduces the contributing factors of a slice and identifies the two types of slicers that exist.

programme.title: Breaking Your Slice With Nathalie Sheehan
programme.desc: Nathalie introduces an error that some might be making with a grip to cause a slice; she also explains the differences between a draw setup with a driver and one with the irons.

programme.title: My Roots: Ernie Els
programme.desc: Follow Ernie's journey from his early years in South Africa, to his climb to world No. 1, his battles with Tiger and the creation of his foundation Els for Autism.

programme.title: My Roots: Bernhard Langer
programme.desc: Bernhard Langer shares his own story in open and honest language, giving golf fans an unprecedented look at his life, losses, and love of the game.

programme.title: My Roots: Ernie Els

programme.title: Private Lessons
programme.desc: J.R. Smith, a two-time NBA champion, visits GolfPass coach Chris Como for a private lesson; after he retired, he enrolled in college and make the North Carolina A&T golf team as a freshman.

programme.title: Private Lessons
programme.desc: The Miz, a two-time WWE champion wrestler takes a private lesson from GolfPass coach Devan Bonebrake; Devan shows The Miz some fixes for his slice.

programme.desc: Viewpoints of people in the game with people who love the game; we discuss what is of interest to them in the vast and deep reservoir of stories within the game of golf.

programme.title: Fairways of Life
programme.desc: New York Times's Best Seller and Golf Channel Host Matt Adams provides unforgettable interviews with golf's legends and stars, as well as lively interactive discussions about the game, travel and the latest in golf equipment.

programme.title: School of Golf
programme.desc: Martin Hall and Blair O'Neal are giving a guide that will make 2024 your best year ever on the course; learn how to put your hands on the club like Tiger Woods, improve your accuracy like Ben Hogan and use baseball to hit your golf ball farther.

programme.title: School of Golf
programme.desc: Martin Hall and Blair O'Neal teach how to drive it longer like a Major Champion; learn a backswing move used by Scottie Scheffler, downswing stretch taught by Jack Nicklaus and solid contact drill straight from Padraig Harrington.

programme.title: School of Golf
programme.desc: Martin Hall and Blair O'Neal teach setup keys, swing changes and creative drills to find more fairways; Martin will also reveal a swing thought that's helped Rory McIlroy become one of the world's best drivers.

programme.title: School of Golf
programme.desc: Martin Hall and Blair O'Neal teach setup keys, swing changes and creative drills to find more fairways; Martin will also reveal a swing thought that's helped Rory McIlroy become one of the world's best drivers.

programme.title: School of Golf
programme.desc: Martin Hall and Blair O'Neal teach how to lower your scores by hitting more greens; find out how to setup for success like Xander Schauffele, improve your pivot like Tom Watson and learn a drill used by Tiger Woods to hit laser-like iron.

programme.title: School of Golf
programme.desc: Martin Hall and Blair O'Neal teach how to control your ball flight like the best players; learn how to draw the ball on command like Rory McIlroy, hit powerful fades like Scottie Scheffler and rip low stingers down the fairway like Tiger Woods.

programme.title: School of Golf
programme.desc: Martin Hall and Blair O'Neal teach how to improve your accuracy and distance; setup for success like Tommy Fleetwood, improve your swing path like Nelly Korda and learn a drill that helped Morgan Pressel win a Major Championship.

programme.title: School of Golf
programme.desc: Martin Hall and Blair O'Neal teach the most important keys to getting up and down around the green; learn how to setup for success like Phil Mickelson, make solid wedge contact like Luke Donald and control trajectory like Tiger Woods.

programme.title: School of Golf
programme.desc: Martin Hall and Blair O'Neal teach putting grips, styles and drills used by the world's best players; learn how to stop pushing putts like Tiger Woods, eliminate the pull like Scottie Scheffler and put better roll on the ball like Dave Stockton.

programme.title: School of Golf
programme.desc: Martin Hall and Blair O'Neal teach how to stick your mid range to full swing wedge shots; learn how to make solid contact like Collin Morikawa, hit it straight down your target line like Steve Stricker and control distance like Rory McIlroy.

programme.title: School of Golf
programme.desc: Martin Hall and Blair O'Neal teach how to stick your mid range to full swing wedge shots; learn how to make solid contact like Collin Morikawa, hit it straight down your target line like Steve Stricker and control distance like Rory McIlroy.
